short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A collection of AEP features designed to provide a frictionless experience for practitioners.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Practitioners working in Adobe Experience Platform can greatly improve their efficiency using our Enhancement Suite. It's been built for practitioners, by practitioners.

Overview of Features

> Speedy Root Cause Analysis
Simply click an icon to download any batch from a dataset, enabling lightning fast diagnosis and error correction. Quickly scale your problem with failed batches, enabling you to prioritize the problem before spending hours addressing it.

> Streamlined Data Collection
Quickly and easily filter rules through applying meta tags to the rule names so you spend less time searching and fumbling with Data Collection's default search UI. For those with a lot of rules, quickly and intuitively identify what's disabled vs. what's enabled. Speed up your publishing workflow with a handy reminder to use a Working Library.

> Intuitive Data Analysis
Toggle word wrap for your dimensions so you don't have to waste time figuring out what's overflowed from the column.
